data.title: Taylor Swift and Abigail Anderson Friendship Timeline
data.meta_description: Taylor Swift met her best friend, Abigail Anderson, when they went to high school together and they're still going strong. Check out their full friendship timeline here!
data.text:
Over the years, Taylor Swift has built wholesome (and honestly, aspirational) friendships with other girlies in the entertainment industry‚Äîsee: Selena Gomez, Gigi Hadid, Emma Stone, Blake Lively, the Haim sisters, Sabrina Carpenter, BEYONC√â. The list of her high-profile besties is truly the gift that keeps giving. Oh, and we obviously can‚Äôt forget how her infamous squad continuously made headlines in the 2010s. In conclusion: We want in on the friendship bracelet making, tysm.

But before Taylor became a Grammy winner, pop culture icon, billionaire, etc., she and a redhead named Abigail Anderson became best friends when they were in high school. Day One Swifties know that Tay and Abigail go *way* back and that she was the ~muse~ behind the Fearless track, ‚ÄúFifteen.‚Äù And, in case you needed proof, here‚Äôs a MySpace-era digi cam pic of these two:

It turns out that the duo is still going strong in our good year 2024, and we simply love to see it. If you want to take a trip down memory lane and relive Taylor and Abigail‚Äôs best friendship moments from the past 20 years (!!!), keep on scrolling for the sweetness.

Circa 2004

Taylor and Abigail met during English class when they were bbs at Hendersonville High School in Nashville, Tennessee. According to Abigail, they bonded over Shakespeare (ya know, as one does).

‚ÄúWe were the ones in the back of the class saying negative things about Romeo and Juliet because we were so bitter toward that emotion at the time. We just really connected‚Ä¶and ever since then we have been inseparable,‚Äù Abigail said when she surprised Taylor on The Ellen Show (more on that later).

Also, just going to leave you with this:

March 3, 2008

Taylor dropped the music video for ‚ÄúI‚Äôm Only Me When I‚Äôm With You,‚Äù aka a super-sweet song about friendship, which features homemade videos with her family and Abigail.

March 14, 2008

The music video for Taylor‚Äôs song ‚ÄúPicture to Burn‚Äù is released, and of course, Abigail makes a cameo in the *iconic* opening scene where they‚Äôre parked outside Taylor‚Äôs ex-boyfriend‚Äôs house. (Can anyone else recite this entire scene? Just me?)

June 12, 2008

Taylor attended prom with a superfan in Tuscaloosa, Alabama, for MTV‚Äôs Once Upon a Prom special. Of course, Abigail was there to help her prep for the big night since she was on tour and didn‚Äôt go to her actual high school prom. According to People, the pair went on a double date with the fan and his best friend.

A fellow T. Swift historian uploaded the entire thing to YouTube, for our viewing pleasure:

November 11, 2008

Taylor‚Äôs sophomore album, Fearless, is released and features a song called ‚ÄúFifteen‚Äù that was inspired by Abigail with lyrics like:

‚ÄúYou sit in class next to a redhead named Abigail and soon enough you‚Äôre best friends / Laughing at the other girls who they think they‚Äôre so cool. We‚Äôll be out of here as soon as we can.‚Äù

Abigail appeared in the music video for the song too.

The day the album was released, Taylor made an appearance on The Ellen Show to promote it, and she was not only surprised by her celeb crush at the time, Justin Timberlake, but also by her childhood bestie, Abigail:

May 15, 2009

During her interview on The Oprah Winfrey Show, Tay gushed about her friendship with Abigail, saying, ‚ÄúBut my best friend, Abigail, we met when I was 15. First day of school freshman year, we sat next to each other in English. She wanted to be a swimmer and go off on a college scholarship for swimming and I wanted to be a singer. Now she‚Äôs off at Kansas on a swimming scholarship and I‚Äôm singing.‚Äù

In a behind-the-scenes Q&A on Oprah‚Äôs website, Taylor also dished that her perfect day off would be one where she pays a visit to Abigail at Kansas University. ‚ÄúI love going to go visit her. It‚Äôs this little college town and it‚Äôs kind of fun, because you always wonder about the path you didn‚Äôt take, and the path I didn‚Äôt take was going to college. So, when I have days off, I like to visit Abigail and experience college without having to take tests and study,‚Äù Taylor said in the clip.

Circa 2010

Not sure when this was exactly, but these webcam selfies are giving big Speak Now vibes and I felt compelled to share:

November 2, 2012

Abigail officially joins Instagram! Some of her first posts? Just a few grainy selfies with Taylor at the CMA Awards:

December 7, 2012

Abigail seemed to be hanging out with Taylor as she posted a pic of her equally famous cat, Meredith.

August 6, 2013

The filter? The high exposure? The kissy faces? I‚Äôm considering this post a peak Instagram artifact:

August 10, 2013

Abigail posts a cute pic from her boat day with Tay:

December 13, 2013

Abigail wishes Taylor a happy birthday on Instagram, writing, ‚ÄúHappy 24th birthday you beautiful girl! I love you and miss you dearly! üéà@taylorswift #comehometomesoooon.‚Äù

December 31, 2013

It looks like Taylor did indeed come home to Abigail soon, because they celebrated New Year‚Äôs together and seemingly soft-launched the 1989 era with this polaroid:

April 6, 2014

Taylor sent Abigail a homemade card for her 24th birthday, writing, ‚ÄúOnce upon a time, there lived a girl named Abigail whose spirit was as fiery as her hair. She never did anything the way they told her to, fell hopelessly in love, and turned 24 without a single regret. Happy birthday. Love, Taylor.‚Äù

‚ÄúWords cannot describe how grateful I am for your friendship (and the absolutely breathtaking package of presents I just received). You truly are the most wonderful human being. From the bottom of my heart...thank you @taylorswift I love you,‚Äù Abigail wrote in her caption.

July 26, 2014

The duo spent a day out in nature, complete with Friends references:

October 2, 2014

‚ÄúWe need a prop. I‚Äôll grab a cat,‚Äù Taylor allegedly said before posing for this selfie with Abigail and Olivia.

October 28, 2014

Abigail celebrates the release of 1989, writing, ‚ÄúOn behalf of all the ears across the world‚ÄîThank you for the most beautiful collaboration of magic and meaning. It‚Äôs a privilege to watch this all unfold. Here‚Äôs to your best one yet, @taylorswift üéâ #1989 #YouCanHearItInTheSilence.‚Äù

November 2, 2014

A few days later, she and Lily Aldridge apparently bought a ton of copies of the album from Target, and of course, it was documented:

December 13, 2014

Abigail attends Taylor‚Äôs star-studded 25th birthday party in NYC, per these Insta posts:

December 31, 2014

According to these snaps, the BFFs celebrated New Year‚Äôs together for the second year in a row.

February 7, 2015

The duo attended a pre-Grammy gala with Taylor‚Äôs other gal pals, Haim.

February 8, 2015

The very next day, Abigail was Taylor‚Äôs date to the Grammys. They also blessed us with these bestie pics:

February 19, 2015

Abigail posts a clip of Taylor blow-drying Olivia because she jumped into the bathtub. Just cat-mom things!

April 5, 2015

Abigail seemingly celebrates her 25th birthday/Easter with Taylor and a buncha other people:

Aaaand she even received a surprise performance from Dashboard Confessional‚Äôs Chris Carrabba. Legendary.

September 27, 2015

Abigail attended Taylor‚Äôs 1989 World Tour and posted this epic video of her ‚ÄúI Knew You Were Trouble‚Äù performance. ‚Äú‚ÄòIs that a world tour...or your girls tour?‚Äô #Both #PowerStance #FlipsHairWalksAway @taylorswift,‚Äù she wrote in her caption.

July 4, 2016

Naturally, Abigail was in attendance at Taylor‚Äôs iconic Fourth of July party in Rhode Island.

July 5, 2016

The next day, the best friends tore up some Spice Girls karaoke alongside the Haim sisters and Kesha.

July 19, 2016

Amid Taylor‚Äôs infamous public feud with Kanye West and Kim Kardashian, Abigail posted some tweets in the singer‚Äôs defense. Per Entertainment Tonight, she had been thinking of the couple‚Äôs daughter, North West, during the drama as she wrote:

‚ÄúLord, hear my prayers.‚Ä¶I pray God helps your daughter understand, that despite how many times she‚Äôll hear daddy reference all women as ‚Äòbitches,‚Äô she isn‚Äôt one,‚Äù she wrote on Monday. ‚ÄúI pray she understands her father actually IS faithful to her mother, despite all the adulterous comments she will hear her father making.‚Ä¶I pray that she will understand ‚Äòadultery and bitches‚Äô are just daddy‚Äôs form of art and not to worry because not every man thinks like him.‚Äù

She reportedly deleted the tweets above and explained, ‚ÄúFor the record, I usually delete my tweets once the death threats start rolling in. Nothing more or less than that. #MovingOn.‚Äù

December 13, 2016

Abigail wished Taylor a happy birthday with another snap from her Fourth of July celebration, writing, ‚ÄúWishing the happiest of birthdays to this girl!üéàThank you for all the light you shine, @taylorswift ‚ú® Here‚Äôs to taking your arm paint just as serious for the next 27 years! üéÇ.‚Äù

December 24, 2016

Taylor and Abigail celebrated Christmas together, and it might have also sparked the beginning of Tay‚Äôs signature blue-tinted photo filter...

October 4, 2017

While Taylor was mainly ~off-the-grid~ ahead of her Reputation era, she ‚Äúcame out of hiding‚Äù to be a bridesmaid in Abigail‚Äôs wedding. According to People, the wedding was held in Martha‚Äôs Vineyard. A source on the scene told the outlet, ‚ÄúShe looked gorgeous. She had dark-red lips and carried her friend‚Äôs train as they went into the church. Security asked the crowd not to rush her.‚Äù

Another bridesmaid also posted a ton of pics including Tay:

October 26, 2017

Abigail teases Reputation with this silly photo bomb:

August 26, 2018

Abigail attended the Reputation Stadium Tour in Nashville, where she was spotted dancing with Karlie Kloss and her sisters.

Abigail also posted a pic of Taylor‚Äôs ‚ÄúDress‚Äù performance on Instagram, writing, ‚ÄúI‚Äôve never been more inspired by any one person in my entire life. You are the epitome of talent and grace. A legend and friend, @taylorswift üåπ#wearenotworthy #iwasscreamsingingallnight #reputationstadiumtour.‚Äù

December 31, 2018

Abigail attended Taylor‚Äôs ‚ÄúChildhood Hero‚Äù‚Äìthemed New Year‚Äôs party...

...and, of course, posted another Meredith pic.

April 23, 2019

Taylor and Abigail hit up Gigi Hadid‚Äôs birthday party and posed for glam photobooth pics with Martha Hunt and Hailee Steinfeld.

August 23, 2019

Abigail celebrated the release of Lover (pretty sure I posted this exact pic at the time, FYI), writing, ‚Äú15 years of knowing you and watching you grow, both as a human and an artist, I can honestly say I‚Äôve never been more proud to call you my friend. I am completely inspired by everything that is you, @taylorswift üíïCongrats, buddy.‚Äù

December 13, 2019

Taylor turned 30, and of course, Abigail was at her birthday party!

January 31, 2020

Taylor‚Äôs Netflix doc, Miss Americana, is released and features this relatable convo between her and Abigail:

Watch 'Miss Americana' on Netflix

May 3, 2023

Abigail shared a sweet selfie with Taylor, where they‚Äôre seen laughing while lying down. ‚Äú‚ÄòCause when you‚Äôre‚Ä¶ 33 ü¶ä,‚Äù she cheekily captioned the post, referencing the lyrics to ‚ÄúFifteen.‚Äù

July 2, 2023

Abigail supported Taylor at the Eras Tour in Nashville! Tay played ‚ÄúFifteen‚Äù as one of the surprise songs and dedicated it to her ‚Äúbeautiful redheaded high school best friend.‚Äù ü•π

November 13, 2023

Abigail subtly gave her stamp of approval for Taylor‚Äôs budding romance with Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce. According to E! News, she Liked the outlet‚Äôs Instagram post about Taylor changing her ‚ÄúKarma‚Äù lyrics during her Eras Tour show in Argentina.

December 13, 2023

Taylor threw a low-key party in NYC for her 34th birthday, and Abigail was among the A-list attendees (ahem: Gigi Hadid, Blake Lively, Sabrina Carpenter, Antoni Porowski, Zo√´ Kravitz, and Jack Antonoff, to name a few).

‚ÄúCan‚Äôt believe this year‚Ä¶actually‚Ä¶happened? Thank you for all your beautiful birthday wishes yesterday. ü•≤,‚Äù Taylor wrote on Instagram.
